bit_field.name: USBVSTBY
bit_field.description: USB voltage regulator in standby mode during VLPR and VLPW modes

bit_field_value.name: SOPT1_USBVSTBY_PWRD
bit_field_value.description: USB voltage regulator not in standby during VLPR and VLPW modes.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT1_USBVSTBY_STBY
bit_field_value.description: USB voltage regulator in standby during VLPR and VLPW modes.

bit_field.name: USBSSTBY
bit_field.description: USB voltage regulator in standby mode during Stop, VLPS, LLS and VLLS modes.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT1_USBSSTBY_PWRD
bit_field_value.description: USB voltage regulator not in standby during Stop, VLPS, LLS and VLLS modes.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT1_USBSSTBY_STBY
bit_field_value.description: USB voltage regulator in standby during Stop, VLPS, LLS and VLLS modes.

bit_field.name: URWE
bit_field.description: USB voltage regulator enable write enable

bit_field.name: UVSWE
bit_field.description: USB voltage regulator VLP standby write enable

bit_field.name: USSWE
bit_field.description: USB voltage regulator stop standby write enable

bit_field.name: USBVREGSEL
bit_field.description: Selects the default input voltage source to the USB Regulator in case both VREG_IN0 and VREG_IN1 are powered. If only one of the regulator inputs is powered, it will automatically be selected by the regulator's power mux circuitry.

bit_field_value.name: USBPHYCTL_USBVREGSEL_VREG_IN0
bit_field_value.description: VREG_IN0 will be selected if both regulator inputs are powered

bit_field_value.name: USBPHYCTL_USBVREGSEL_VREG_IN1
bit_field_value.description: VREG_IN1 will be selected if both regulator inputs are powered

bit_field.name: USBVREGPD
bit_field.description: Enables the pulldown on the output of the USB Regulator.

bit_field_value.name: USBPHYCTL_USBVREGPD_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: Regulator output pulldown resistor is not enabled

bit_field_value.name: USBPHYCTL_USBVREGPD_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: Regulator output pulldown resistor is enabled

bit_field_value.name: USBPHYCTL_USB3VOUTTRG_V3_662
bit_field_value.description: 3.662V (For Freescale use only, not for customer use)

bit_field_value.name: USBPHYCTL_USBDISILIM_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: The current limiter for the USB Voltage Regulator is enabled

bit_field_value.name: USBPHYCTL_USBDISILIM_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: The current limiter for the USB Voltage Regulator is disabled

bit_field_value.name: SOPT2_RTCCLKOUTSEL_F1HZ
bit_field_value.description: RTC 1 Hz clock is output on the RTC_CLKOUT pin.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT2_RTCCLKOUTSEL_F32KHZ
bit_field_value.description: RTC 32.768kHz clock is output on the RTC_CLKOUT pin.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT2_FBSL_DISALLOWED0
bit_field_value.description: All off-chip accesses (instruction and data) via the FlexBus or SDRAM are disallowed.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT2_FBSL_DISALLOWED1
bit_field_value.description: All off-chip accesses (instruction and data) via the FlexBus or SDRAM are disallowed.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT2_FBSL_DATA
bit_field_value.description: Off-chip instruction accesses are disallowed. Data accesses are allowed.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT2_FBSL_ALL
bit_field_value.description: Off-chip instruction accesses and data accesses are allowed.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT2_TRACECLKSEL_MCGOUTCLK
bit_field_value.description: MCGOUTCLK, divided by the TRACECLK fractional divider as configured by SIM_CLKDIV4[TRACEFRAC, TRACEDIV]

bit_field_value.name: SOPT2_USBSRC_PLLFLLSEL
bit_field_value.description: MCGFLLCLK, or MCGPLLCLK , or IRC48M , or USB1 PFD clock as selected by SOPT2[PLLFLLSEL], and then divided by the USB fractional divider as configured by SIM_CLKDIV2[USBFRAC, USBDIV].

bit_field_value.name: SOPT2_TIMESRC_PLLFLLSEL
bit_field_value.description: MCGFLLCLK , or MCGPLLCLK , or IRC48M , or USB1 PFD clock as selected by SOPT2[PLLFLLSEL].

bit_field_value.name: SOPT2_TPMSRC_PLLFLLSEL
bit_field_value.description: MCGFLLCLK , or MCGPLLCLK , or IRC48M , or USB1 PFD clock as selected by SOPT2[PLLFLLSEL], and then divided by the PLLFLLCLK fractional divider as configured by SIM_CLKDIV3[PLLFLLFRAC, PLLFLLDIV].

bit_field_value.name: SOPT2_LPUARTSRC_PLLFLLSEL
bit_field_value.description: MCGFLLCLK , or MCGPLLCLK , or IRC48M , or USB1 PFD clock as selected by SOPT2[PLLFLLSEL], and then divided by the PLLFLLCLK fractional divider as configured by SIM_CLKDIV3[PLLFLLFRAC, PLLFLLDIV].

bit_field_value.name: SOPT2_SDHCSRC_PLLFLLSEL
bit_field_value.description: MCGFLLCLK, or MCGPLLCLK , or IRC48M , or USB1 PFD clock as selected by SOPT2[PLLFLLSEL].

bit_field.name: FTM1CH0SRC
bit_field.description: FTM1 channel 0 input capture source select

bit_field.name: FTM2CH0SRC
bit_field.description: FTM2 channel 0 input capture source select

bit_field.name: FTM2CH1SRC
bit_field.description: FTM2 channel 1 input capture source select

bit_field_value.name: SOPT4_FTM2CH1SRC_XOR_FTM
bit_field_value.description: Exclusive OR of FTM2_CH1, FTM2_CH0 and FTM1_CH1.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT4_FTM2CLKSEL_CLK0
bit_field_value.description: FTM2 external clock driven by FTM_CLK0 pin.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT4_FTM2CLKSEL_CLK1
bit_field_value.description: FTM2 external clock driven by FTM_CLK1 pin.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT4_FTM3CLKSEL_CLK0
bit_field_value.description: FTM3 external clock driven by FTM_CLK0 pin.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT4_FTM3CLKSEL_CLK1
bit_field_value.description: FTM3 external clock driven by FTM_CLK1 pin.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT4_FTM0TRG0SRC_CMP
bit_field_value.description: HSCMP0 output drives FTM0 hardware trigger 0

bit_field_value.name: SOPT4_FTM0TRG0SRC_FTM
bit_field_value.description: FTM1 channel match drives FTM0 hardware trigger 0

bit_field_value.name: SOPT4_FTM0TRG1SRC_PDB
bit_field_value.description: PDB output trigger 1 drives FTM0 hardware trigger 1

bit_field_value.name: SOPT4_FTM0TRG1SRC_FTM
bit_field_value.description: FTM2 channel match drives FTM0 hardware trigger 1

bit_field_value.name: SOPT4_FTM3TRG0SRC_FTM
bit_field_value.description: FTM1 channel match drives FTM3 hardware trigger 0

bit_field_value.name: SOPT4_FTM3TRG1SRC_FTM
bit_field_value.description: FTM2 channel match drives FTM3 hardware trigger 1

bit_field_value.name: SOPT5_UART0TXSRC_UART_TX_FTM1
bit_field_value.description: UART0_TX pin modulated with FTM1 channel 0 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT5_UART0TXSRC_UART_TX_FTM2
bit_field_value.description: UART0_TX pin modulated with FTM2 channel 0 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT5_UART1TXSRC_UART_TX_FTM1
bit_field_value.description: UART1_TX pin modulated with FTM1 channel 0 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT5_UART1TXSRC_UART_TX_FTM2
bit_field_value.description: UART1_TX pin modulated with FTM2 channel 0 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT5_LPUART0TXSRC_UART_TX_FTM1
bit_field_value.description: LPUART0_TX pin modulated with TPM1 channel 0 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT5_LPUART0TXSRC_UART_TX_FTM2
bit_field_value.description: LPUART0_TX pin modulated with TPM2 channel 0 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT7_ADC0TRGSEL_TPM
bit_field_value.description: TPM1 channel 0 (A pretrigger) and channel 1 (B pretrigger)

bit_field_value.name: SOPT7_ADC1TRGSEL_TPM
bit_field_value.description: TPM2 channel 0 (A pretrigger) and channel 1 (B pretrigger)

bit_field_value.name: SOPT7_ADC1ALTTRGEN_ALT
bit_field_value.description: Alternate trigger selected for ADC1 as defined by ADC1TRGSEL.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM0SYNCBIT_TRIGGER
bit_field_value.description: Write 1 to assert the TRIG0 input to FTM0, software must clear this bit to allow other trigger sources to assert.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM1SYNCBIT_TRIGGER
bit_field_value.description: Write 1 to assert the TRIG0 input to FTM1, software must clear this bit to allow other trigger sources to assert.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM2SYNCBIT_TRIGGER
bit_field_value.description: Write 1 to assert the TRIG0 input to FTM2, software must clear this bit to allow other trigger sources to assert.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM3SYNCBIT_TRIGGER
bit_field_value.description: Write 1 to assert the TRIG0 input to FTM3, software must clear this bit to allow other trigger sources to assert.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM0OCH0SRC_FTM
bit_field_value.description: FTM0_CH0 pin is output of FTM0 channel 0 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM0OCH0SRC_FTM_MODULATED
bit_field_value.description: FTM0_CH0 pin is output of FTM0 channel 0 output, modulated by FTM1 channel 1 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM0OCH1SRC_FTM
bit_field_value.description: FTM0_CH1 pin is output of FTM0 channel 1 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM0OCH1SRC_FTM_MODULATED
bit_field_value.description: FTM0_CH1 pin is output of FTM0 channel 1 output, modulated by FTM1 channel 1 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM0OCH2SRC_FTM
bit_field_value.description: FTM0_CH2 pin is output of FTM0 channel 2 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM0OCH2SRC_FTM_MODULATED
bit_field_value.description: FTM0_CH2 pin is output of FTM0 channel 2 output, modulated by FTM1 channel 1 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM0OCH3SRC_FTM
bit_field_value.description: FTM0_CH3 pin is output of FTM0 channel 3 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM0OCH3SRC_FTM_MODULATED
bit_field_value.description: FTM0_CH3 pin is output of FTM0 channel 3 output, modulated by FTM1 channel 1 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM0OCH4SRC_FTM
bit_field_value.description: FTM0_CH4 pin is output of FTM0 channel 4 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM0OCH4SRC_FTM_MODULATED
bit_field_value.description: FTM0_CH4 pin is output of FTM0 channel 4 output, modulated by FTM1 channel 1 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM0OCH5SRC_FTM
bit_field_value.description: FTM0_CH5 pin is output of FTM0 channel 5 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM0OCH5SRC_FTM_MODULATED
bit_field_value.description: FTM0_CH5 pin is output of FTM0 channel 5 output, modulated by FTM1 channel 1 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM0OCH6SRC_FTM
bit_field_value.description: FTM0_CH6 pin is output of FTM0 channel 6 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM0OCH6SRC_FTM_MODULATED
bit_field_value.description: FTM0_CH6 pin is output of FTM0 channel 6 output, modulated by FTM1 channel 1 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM0OCH7SRC_FTM
bit_field_value.description: FTM0_CH7 pin is output of FTM0 channel 7 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM0OCH7SRC_FTM_MODULATED
bit_field_value.description: FTM0_CH7 pin is output of FTM0 channel 7 output, modulated by FTM1 channel 1 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM3OCH0SRC_FTM
bit_field_value.description: FTM3_CH0 pin is output of FTM3 channel 0 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM3OCH0SRC_FTM_MODULATED
bit_field_value.description: FTM3_CH0 pin is output of FTM3 channel 0 output modulated by FTM2 channel 1 output.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM3OCH1SRC_FTM
bit_field_value.description: FTM3_CH1 pin is output of FTM3 channel 1 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM3OCH1SRC_FTM_MODULATED
bit_field_value.description: FTM3_CH1 pin is output of FTM3 channel 1 output modulated by FTM2 channel 1 output.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM3OCH2SRC_FTM
bit_field_value.description: FTM3_CH2 pin is output of FTM3 channel 2 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM3OCH2SRC_FTM_MODULATED
bit_field_value.description: FTM3_CH2 pin is output of FTM3 channel 2 output modulated by FTM2 channel 1 output.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM3OCH3SRC_FTM
bit_field_value.description: FTM3_CH3 pin is output of FTM3 channel 3 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM3OCH3SRC_FTM_MODULATED
bit_field_value.description: FTM3_CH3 pin is output of FTM3 channel 3 output modulated by FTM2 channel 1 output.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM3OCH4SRC_FTM
bit_field_value.description: FTM3_CH4 pin is output of FTM3 channel 4 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM3OCH4SRC_FTM_MODULATED
bit_field_value.description: FTM3_CH4 pin is output of FTM3 channel 4 output modulated by FTM2 channel 1 output.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM3OCH5SRC_FTM
bit_field_value.description: FTM3_CH5 pin is output of FTM3 channel 5 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM3OCH5SRC_FTM_MODULATED
bit_field_value.description: FTM3_CH5 pin is output of FTM3 channel 5 output modulated by FTM2 channel 1 output.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM3OCH6SRC_FTM
bit_field_value.description: FTM3_CH6 pin is output of FTM3 channel 6 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM3OCH6SRC_FTM_MODULATED
bit_field_value.description: FTM3_CH6 pin is output of FTM3 channel 6 output modulated by FTM2 channel 1 output.

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM3OCH7SRC_FTM
bit_field_value.description: FTM3_CH7 pin is output of FTM3 channel 7 output

bit_field_value.name: SOPT8_FTM3OCH7SRC_FTM_MODULATED
bit_field_value.description: FTM3_CH7 pin is output of FTM3 channel 7 output modulated by FTM2 channel 1 output.

bit_field.name: TPM1CH0SRC
bit_field.description: TPM1 channel 0 input capture source select

bit_field.name: TPM2CH0SRC
bit_field.description: TPM2 channel 0 input capture source select

bit_field_value.name: SDID_FAMID_0b010
bit_field_value.description: K3x Family or K1x/K6x Family (with tamper)

bit_field_value.name: SDID_FAMID_0b011
bit_field_value.description: K4x Family or K2x Family (with tamper)

bit_field_value.name: FCFG1_FLASHDOZE_FLASH_EN
bit_field_value.description: Flash remains enabled during Wait mode

bit_field_value.name: FCFG1_FLASHDOZE_FLASH_DIS
bit_field_value.description: Flash is disabled for the duration of Wait mode

bit_field_value.name: FCFG2_PFLSH_ONLY_PFLSH
bit_field_value.description: Program Flash only, device does not support FlexNVM
